title: Network Speed & Latency Issues
description: Troubleshoot slow internet, buffering, and high ping during calls/tasks.

steps.title: Run a Speed Test
steps.instruction: Go to Speedtest.net. If your speed is below 5Mbps, it may be a local signal issue or ISP throttling.

steps.title: Close High-Bandwidth Apps
steps.instruction: Close YouTube, Netflix, Spotify, or large downloads in the background that compete for bandwidth.

steps.title: Disconnect From VPN
steps.instruction: If you are using a corporate VPN, disconnect to see if speed improves. VPNs often add significant latency.

steps.title: Check Wifi Signal Strength
steps.instruction: Move closer to the router. Thick walls or interference from appliances can drastically reduce wifi speeds.

steps.title: Update Network Driver
steps.instruction: Go to Device Manager → Network Adapters → Right-click your Wifi/Ethernet card → Update driver.
